Regarding the installation of Verus, you may encounter false positive warnings from antivirus software such as Avast and Kaspersky. These warnings are actually alerts that you are installing mining software, which could potentially be used by a third party to exploit your PC.

To better understand these false positives, you can review resources from reputable sources such as Malwarebytes and Kaspersky, which provide more information on these types of warnings and how to handle them.
